description: This file implements internal backend APIs for the COSA Data Model related to Neighbor Discovery, including creation, initialization, removal, and registration of neighbor discovery interfaces within the system, along with managing associated configuration data.

classes.name: COSA_DATAMODEL_NEIGHDISC
classes.description: Data structure representing the neighbor discovery data model, containing interface lists, folder handles, and configuration data.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CosaNeighdiscCreate(VOID)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new neighbor discovery data model object, setting up essential function pointers and calling initialize.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaNeighdiscInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Performs setup procedures for neighbor discovery, such as creating registry folders, initializing interface lists, and loading existing entries from persistent storage.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaNeighdiscRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cleans up and deallocates all resources associated with the neighbor discovery object, including interface lists and registry entries.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaNeighdiscRegGetInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Reads neighbor discovery interface information from persistent storage, reconstructing the in-memory list of interfaces.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaNeighdiscRegAddInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Registers a new neighbor discovery interface by adding its details into the persistent storage and updating related structure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaNeighdiscRegDelInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Removes a specified neighbor discovery interface's data from persistent storage.

ctags.name: CosaNeighdiscRegAddInfo
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
